fn.p: The authors have declared financial relationships, which are detailed in the next section.

Sandra Neumann Emily Henderson declare(s) a grant from National Institute of Health Research. SN’s salary is funded by the NIHR Health Technology Assessment. The NIHR did not support, fund, design or in other way influence this study. EH is the chief investigator of the grant funded by the NIHR Health Technology Assessment. Emily Henderson declare(s) a grant from The Gatsby Foundation. EH has received research funding from the Gatsby Foundation. Emily Henderson declare(s) a grant from Parkinson’s-UK. EH has received research funding from Parkinson's UK. Emily Henderson declare(s) a grant from British Geriatric Society. EH has received research funding from the British Geriatric Society. Emily Henderson declare(s) travel, consultancy and honoraria from Profile, Bial, Abbvie, Luye, and Ever pharma. EH has received travel, consultancy and honoraria
